briefdescription.para: Enables and configures the LED Matrix and corresponding shift registers.

parameterdescription.para: The handle to represent and use the matrix of LEDs.

simplesect.para: Returns an error if the could not allocate enough memory or if shift register configuration failed, else returns ESP_OK

briefdescription.para: Converts a boolean array of size CONFIG_LED_MATRIX_ROWSxCONFIG_LED_MATRIX_COLUMNS to a 32-bit unsigned integer.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean input array of dimensions (CONFIG_LED_MATRIX_ROWS, CONFIG_LED_MATRIX_COLUMNS)

simplesect.para: A 32-bit value representing the LED states, where each bit corresponds to one physical LED as defined by led_matrix_map.

memberdef.argsstring: (led_matrix *matrix, const uint8_t logical_pin, const uint8_t led_value)
memberdef.name: led_matrix_set_bit

briefdescription.para: Sets a single bit of the "data" field of the passed in matrix.

parameterdescription.para: The handle to represent and use the matrix of LEDs.
The logical index of the pin (varies from [0, led_matrix_rows * led_matrix_columns - 1])
The value to set the LED (can be 0 - LOW or 1 - HIGH)

simplesect.para: Returns an error if a NULL matrix is passed or if the led number exceeds (led_matrix_rows * led_matrix_columns - 1), else returns ESP_OK

briefdescription.para: Sets all the bits of the "data" field of the passed in matrix using led_matrix_set_bit().

parameterdescription.para: The handle to represent and use the matrix of LEDs.
The data to write to the LED matrix.

simplesect.para: Returns an error if a NULL matrix is passed, else returns ESP_OK

briefdescription.para: Sets all the bits of the "data" field.

parameterdescription.para: The handle to represent and use the matrix of LEDs.
The bitfield used to set the values of the LED matrix.

simplesect.para: Returns an error if a NULL matrix is passed, else returns ESP_OK

briefdescription.para: Performs the write from the led_matrix structure to the actual LEDs on board.

parameterdescription.para: The handle to represent and use the matrix of LEDs.
The way in which to display the values from the shift register.

simplesect.para: Returns an error if a NULL matrix is passed, else returns ESP_OK

briefdescription.para: Displays the entered string character by character on the LED Matrix with a delay of "wait_ms" ms between characters.

parameterdescription.para: The handle to represent and use the matrix of LEDs.
The message to be displayed on the screen.
The time to wait between two characters (in ms)

simplesect.para: Returns an error if a NULL matrix or message is passed, else returns ESP_OK

briefdescription.para: Performs cleanup on the LED Matrix contents.

parameterdescription.para: The handle to represent and use the matrix of LEDs

simplesect.para: Returns an error if there is an error while cleaning up the shift register, else returns ESP_OK
